title: Our Story
subtitle: A peek behind the scenes of our journey and growth.

bios.subtitle: Our Humble Beginnings
bios.description: We started out in a small garage with second-hand instruments and big dreams. Late nights, lots of coffee, and endless jam sessions defined our early days.

bios.title: March 2011
bios.subtitle: A Band is Born
bios.description: After months of practice and a few local gigs, we officially formed the band. Our chemistry clicked, and suddenly, what started as a hobby became our shared passion.

bios.title: December 2012
bios.subtitle: On the Road
bios.description: We hit the road for our first tour, traveling in a beat-up van, sleeping on floors, and discovering what it really means to live for music. Every show brought new fans and unforgettable memories.

bios.title: July 2014
bios.subtitle: Into the Studio
bios.description: Studio time was a game-changer. Recording our first album pushed us creatively, tested our patience, and taught us how to capture the energy of our live performances in every track.

bios.title:
Be Part
Of Our
Story!
bios.subtitle: Join us on the journey
bios.description: Weâ€™re still writing new chapters every day. From upcoming shows to new songs, we want you along for every moment. The best is yet to come!
